name: Noire Truth
author: Cheeseismysoul
description:
Noire
 truth is a 1-bit palette that asks questions. Questions like why 
are you not using Noire truth yet. The white is stained with your 
afternoon coffee; the blue-black is the combination of your two 
favourite pen inks. You mixed them to save the time of choosing. you 
need to save all the time you can. After all,  you want to 
retire soon, right?
